TextLibrary.Text: I have a plan for where we might go next. We need a device to locate where their ship has gone.
I have a plan for where we might go next. We need a device to locate where their ship has gone.

This only addresses the symptom, not the disease. If the Soulless were a virus, we would seek out Patient Zero. I believe if we find the very first of them, the one from which the other clones were made, they may still be human enough to reason with.

This only addresses the symptom, not the disease. If the Soulless were a virus, we would seek out Patient Zero. I believe if we find the very first of them, the one from which the other clones were made, they may still be human enough to reason with.
Perhaps these two tasks are not dissimilar. In finding one, we may well find the other.
Perhaps these two tasks are not dissimilar. In finding one, we may well find the other.
But where would we get such a device?
But where would we get such a device?
There is a locator, called a Starhound, that we may be able to purchase in the Emporium of Keck.
There is a locator, called a Starhound, that we may be able to purchase in the Emporium of Keck.
